data.title: News
data.meta_description: Black Sabbath  together with BMG and Pitchblack Playback have confirmed two commemorative 50th Anniversary album listening sessions for their debut self-titled album ‘Black Sabbath’. The...
data.text:
Black Sabbath together with BMG and Pitchblack Playback have confirmed two commemorative 50th Anniversary album listening sessions for their debut self-titled album ‘Black Sabbath’. The sessions, which will be held ‘in the dark’ on 11th February 2020, kick off celebrations for the release which is considered a milestone in metal.

Photo: Press.

Limerick's electronic arts festival LEAF has set 10th to 13th September 2020 as the dates for it's inaugural outing. This ambitious departure for the southern Irish city will see leaders of the technological world join forces with pioneers of electronic music to entertain the masses at this brand-new festival.

Electric Picnic, Ireland's largest music and arts festival, has launched its' 2020 'Art Caravan' competition. Taking place from 5th - 6th September in Stradbally, Co. Laois, the winners will land a spot at the event's popular Trailer Park area.

Photo: Darren McLoughlin.

January's Metal Hall of Fame event, which took place in Anaheim, California on 15th January 2020, is set for an airing via Amazon Prime Movies, later this year. The event, which honoured those from the worlds of rock and metal, concluded with an all-star jam featuring award-winners Steve Vai, Joe Satriani, Geoff Tate, and former Megadeth player Chris Poland.

Photo: Eamon O'Neill.

Rewind Festival, the world's first and biggest '80s music festival has announced it's 2020 return with Rewind Scotland, Rewind North, and Rewind South. This year's events follow on from 2019's event, which saw the Henley event prove a feast of nostalgia for the '80s and beyond.

Photo: Eamon O'Neill.

Download Festival has announced more bands to join headliners Iron Maiden, Kiss, and System of a Down. The latest bunch includes Alter Bridge, the Darkness, and Mastodon, who will all join the world’s premier rock event which takes place form 12th - 14th June 2020 at Donington Park, Leicestershire.

Nicko McBrain has spoken about the passing of Neil Peart, calling the Rush drummer; "a true diplomat for the instrument, a wonderful human being, and a phenomenal player". The Iron Maiden drummer made the comments while talking to eonmusic at the NAMM Show in Anaheim, California, on Friday (17th January 2020).

Photo: Daniel Ackerley-Holmes.

Ramblin' Man Fair has added Lynyrd Skynyrd as their Saturday Night headliner, joining the already announced Clutch at the top of the 2020 bill. Returning for a sixth year to Mote Park in Maidstone, Kent, this years' event takes place on the 17th, 18th and 19th July.

​The originators of Rap Metal, Body Count are back. Ice-T and his band are as angry as ever on their 7th studio album, titled 'Carnivore', which coincides with their 30th anniversary as a band. Released via Century Media Records on 6th March 2020, pre-orders will start on 10th January.

Photo: Press.

Corrosion of Conformity are heading back to Europe for a Spring 2020 tour. Hitting these shores in April and May 2020, the sixteen date run includes shows in Belfast and Dublin, and follows on from 2018's tour, which saw the North Carolina act lay siege in Limerick.

Photo: Press.
